comment: The main text block containing Chinese characters in a traditional vertical layout, enclosed within a black border. It includes various entries with definitions, phonetic notations (e.g., '切'), and structural explanations (e.g., '象耳頭足' or '从木戴孚甲'). The right margin contains page number information ('小二百四十五', '說文十四下') and possibly a publisher or edition mark ('嚴華').
